text: Antonio Maurogiovanni (born 20 October 1965) is an Italian rower. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bari
title: Antonio Maurogiovanni
